Package com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j

Contains core classes for instantiating a MarkLogic backed RDF4J Repository (MarkLogicRepository) and connection (MarkLogicRepositoryConnection), including exceptions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MarkLogicRepository
    RDF4J repository representing a MarkLogic triple store, exposing MarkLogic-specific features; SPARQL and Graph queries in all SPARQL forms, rulesets for inferencing, efficient size queries, combination queries, base uri, and permissions.
    MarkLogicRepositoryConnection
    RepositoryConnection to MarkLogic triplestore
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MarkLogicRdf4jException
    Specific exception for throwing MarkLogic related errors.
    MarkLogicTransactionException
    Specific exception for throwing MarkLogic transaction exceptions.

Package com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j Description

Contains core classes for instantiating a MarkLogic backed RDF4J Repository (MarkLogicRepository) and connection (MarkLogicRepositoryConnection), including exceptions.
